wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Alexander Thomson (born 14 January 1997) is a Scottish professional footballer, who plays as a midfielder for Irish side Derry City. Thomson started his senior career at Celtic and he has played on loan at Dumbarton, Livingston, two spells at Queen of the South and Dunfermline Athletic. Thomson has also been capped for Scotland at every age level from under-15 to under-21.
